name: GET_DescribeOrderableDBInstanceOptions
description: Returns a list of orderable instance options for the specified engine.

Engine.description: The name of the engine to retrieve instance options for.

EngineVersion.description: The engine version filter value. Specify this parameter to show only the available offerings that match the specified engine version.

DBInstanceClass.description: The instance class filter value. Specify this parameter to show only the available offerings that match the specified instance class.

LicenseModel.description: The license model filter value. Specify this parameter to show only the available offerings that match the specified license model.

Vpc.description: The virtual private cloud (VPC) filter value. Specify this parameter to show only the available VPC or non-VPC offerings.

Filters.description: This parameter is not currently supported.

MaxRecords.description:
The maximum number of records to include in the response. If more records exist than the specified MaxRecords value, a pagination token (marker) is included in the response so that the remaining results can be retrieved.

Default: 100

Constraints: Minimum 20, maximum 100.

Marker.description: An optional pagination token provided by a previous request. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond the marker, up to the value specified by MaxRecords.

allOf.description: The name of the filter. Filter names are case sensitive.
One or more filter values. Filter values are case sensitive.

Filter.description:
A named set of filter values, used to return a more specific list of results. You can use a filter to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as IDs.

Wildcards are not supported in filters.
